name: PHP
color: invert(53%) sepia(8%) saturate(2152%) hue-rotate(198deg) brightness(92%) contrast(81%);
description: PHP is a popular general-purpose scripting language that is especially suited to web development. Fast, flexible and pragmatic, PHP powers everything from your blog to the most popular websites in the world.

name: Laravel
color: invert(26%) sepia(39%) saturate(5823%) hue-rotate(349deg) brightness(106%) contrast(104%);
description: Laravel is a web application framework with expressive, elegant syntax. We’ve already laid the foundation — freeing you to create without sweating the small things.

name: Solidity
color: invert(18%) sepia(0%) saturate(3261%) hue-rotate(238deg) brightness(85%) contrast(82%);
description: Solidity is an object-oriented, high-level language for implementing smart contracts. Smart contracts are programs which govern the behaviour of accounts within the Ethereum state.

name: Web3.js
color: invert(50%) sepia(51%) saturate(3349%) hue-rotate(348deg) brightness(98%) contrast(92%);
description: web3.js is a collection of libraries that allow you to interact with a local or remote ethereum node using HTTP, IPC or WebSocket.

name: Vue
color: invert(65%) sepia(8%) saturate(2407%) hue-rotate(101deg) brightness(100%) contrast(89%);
description: Vue is an open-source model–view–viewmodel front end JavaScript framework for building user interfaces and single-page applications.

name: Nuxt
color: invert(60%) sepia(93%) saturate(1112%) hue-rotate(106deg) brightness(94%) contrast(104%);
description: Build your next Vue.js application with confidence using Nuxt. An open source framework making web development simple and powerful.

name: Vuetify
color: invert(25%) sepia(68%) saturate(1741%) hue-rotate(192deg) brightness(107%) contrast(88%);
description: Vuetify is a Vue UI Library with beautifully handcrafted Material Components. No design skills required — everything you need to create amazing applications is at your fingertips.

name: Tailwind
color: invert(58%) sepia(64%) saturate(1994%) hue-rotate(146deg) brightness(93%) contrast(95%);
description: A utility-first CSS framework packed with classes like flex, pt-4, text-center and rotate-90 that can be composed to build any design, directly in your markup.

name: Redis
color: invert(25%) sepia(69%) saturate(3268%) hue-rotate(349deg) brightness(93%) contrast(85%);
description: Redis is an open source (BSD licensed), in-memory data structure store, used as a database, cache, and message broker.

name: PostgreSQL
color: invert(37%) sepia(14%) saturate(7150%) hue-rotate(208deg) brightness(95%) contrast(86%);
description: PostgreSQL is a powerful, open source object-relational database system with over 30 years of active development that has earned it a strong reputation for reliability, feature robustness, and performance.

name: MySQL
color: invert(41%) sepia(87%) saturate(279%) hue-rotate(163deg) brightness(90%) contrast(92%);
description: MySQL Database Service is a fully managed database service to deploy cloud-native applications.

name: Livewire
color: invert(35%) sepia(18%) saturate(2107%) hue-rotate(197deg) brightness(89%) contrast(83%);
description: Livewire is a full-stack framework for Laravel that makes building dynamic interfaces simple, without leaving the comfort of Laravel.

name: Bootstrap
color: invert(39%) sepia(11%) saturate(4338%) hue-rotate(227deg) brightness(86%) contrast(80%);
description: Quickly design and customize responsive mobile-first sites with Bootstrap, the world’s most popular front-end open source toolkit, featuring Sass variables and mixins, responsive grid system, extensive prebuilt components, and powerful JavaScript plugins.

name: Docker
color: invert(46%) sepia(95%) saturate(1723%) hue-rotate(183deg) brightness(97%) contrast(91%);
description: Docker takes away repetitive, mundane configuration tasks and is used throughout the development lifecycle for fast, easy and portable application development - desktop and cloud.

name: Nginx
color: invert(31%) sepia(100%) saturate(1269%) hue-rotate(121deg) brightness(94%) contrast(101%);
description: Nginx is a web server that can also be used as a reverse proxy, load balancer, mail proxy and HTTP cache.

name: Git
color: invert(39%) sepia(85%) saturate(2528%) hue-rotate(343deg) brightness(98%) contrast(93%);
description: Git is a free and open source distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency.

name: Google Tag Manager
color: invert(40%) sepia(99%) saturate(610%) hue-rotate(179deg) brightness(87%) contrast(100%);
description: Google Tag Manager is a tag management system that allows you to quickly and easily update measurement codes and related code fragments collectively known as tags on your website or mobile app.

name: Google Analytics
color: invert(50%) sepia(40%) saturate(3959%) hue-rotate(8deg) brightness(96%) contrast(103%);
description: Google Analytics lets you measure your advertising ROI as well as track your Flash, video, and social networking sites and applications.

name: Vim
color: invert(23%) sepia(98%) saturate(2803%) hue-rotate(139deg) brightness(101%) contrast(101%);
description: Vim is a highly configurable text editor built to make creating and changing any kind of text very efficient. It is included as 'vi' with most UNIX systems and with Apple OS X.

name: Linux
color: invert(89%) sepia(17%) saturate(3166%) hue-rotate(338deg) brightness(103%) contrast(98%);
description: Linux is a family of open-source Unix-like operating systems based on the Linux kernel, an operating system kernel first released on September 17, 1991, by Linus Torvalds. Linux is typically packaged in a Linux distribution.
